page.title: 13Farming
page.content: The land in our two squares is mostly Animal Farming ,in Rowsham there are two farms .Manor Farm and Home Farm both of these farm animals .The Masters Farm speciallises in poultry at Christmas time (Turkey,Chicken and goose).The Masters Farm employs quite a few farm labourers the actual farm house is very old probaly built in the seventeenth century the house backs onto acres of rambling fields. Manor Farm is the other farm of which I spoke it also farms mainly animals .The actual house has been bought by other people and now has nothing to do with the farm or its land .In the first paddock there are six big horsechestnut trees where in autumn you can get the biggest conkers for miles around.
